name: Classic Fried Rice
ingredients: 3 cups cooked rice, 2 eggs, 1 cup mixed vegetables, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp oil, 2 cloves garlic, 1 onion
instructions: Heat oil, scramble eggs and set aside. Stir-fry vegetables and garlic, add rice, soy sauce, and eggs. Cook for 5 minutes.

name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: 2 cups basmati rice, 1 lb chicken, 1 cup yogurt, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 2-inch ginger, biryani masala, saffron, ghee
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Layer partially cooked rice with chicken. Cook on low heat until rice is fluffy and chicken is tender.
